testcase.classname: User can register and has an account on the website
testcase.name: User register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given User open registration page...........................................passed When User enter gender type.................................................passed And User enter first name "Mohamed" and last name "Moustafa"................passed And User select date of birth...............................................passed And User enter email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com"............................passed And User enter password fields "P@ssword123"................................passed And User click on register button...........................................passed Then success registration message appears...................................passed And User click on continue button to return to home page....................passed

testcase.classname: User can log in the website
testcase.name: User login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User open login page..................................................passed When User enter email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123".passed And User click on login button..............................................passed Then User login successfully and return to home page........................passed

testcase.classname: User can log in the website
testcase.name: User login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User open login page..................................................passed When User enter email "invalid.email@test.com" and password "invalid.password".passed And User click on login button..............................................passed Then User login failed and error message appears............................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user can switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: User change currency from US to Euro
testcase.system-out: Given User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123".passed When User select euro currency from drop down menu..........................passed Then All items prices change to euro........................................passed

testcase.classname: User can reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: User reset password with valid email
testcase.system-out: Given User at login page....................................................passed When User click on forgot password link.....................................passed And User enter valid email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com"......................passed And User click on recover button............................................passed Then message appears tell user that an email has been sent to him...........passed

testcase.classname: User can reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: User reset password with invalid email
testcase.system-out: Given User at login page....................................................passed When User click on forgot password link.....................................passed And User enter valid email "invalid.email@test.com".........................passed And User click on recover button............................................passed Then message appears tell user this email is not found......................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user can select different Categories in the website
testcase.name: User select sub-category
testcase.system-out: Given User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123".passed When User hover to a category and click on one of its sub-categories........passed Then User will navigate to a page contains products about that sub-category.passed

testcase.classname: Logged user can filter with color
testcase.name: Logged user filter products with color
testcase.system-out: Given User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123".passed And User navigate to category which has filter color options for its products.passed When User select a specific color from options..............................passed Then Category products will change to be for that color only................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user can add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: Logged user add different products to Shopping cart
